alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 9:15PM CST until January 02 at 9:45PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Greene. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 915 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - This includes the following low water crossings... Little Pomme De Terre River at Highway CC, Cabin Creek at Cabin Creek Road, Wilson`s Creek at Farm Road 150 and Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Battlefield, Strafford, Fair Grove, Turners, Galloway and Bassville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
